DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : To assess sleep satisfaction Zolpidem CR ( Ambien CR ) administration Secondary Objective : To assess Psychomotor Performance Zolpidem CR ( Ambien CR ) administration
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients consult Psychiatrists ( private hospital ) whatever reason consult present chronic primary insomnia DSM IV ( Diagnostic Statistical Manual Revision 4 ) . Accepting participate study signing inform consent Exclusion criterion : Pregnancy breastfeed . Current severe neuropsychiatric disorder ( i.e . psychosis , obsessive compulsive disorder , major depression , dementia Alzheimer vascular type ) accord DSM IV criterion . History substance abuse dependence ( include alcohol ) within past year . Hypersensitivity zolpidem excipients . Severe hepatic insufficiency Severe and/or acute respiratory insufficiency Myasthenia gravis . OTC ( Over The Counter ) sleep remedy prescription sleep medication within 2 week 5 halflife screening . Severe medical illness . The information intend contain consideration relevant patient 's potential participation clinical trial .
